import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./Home.css";// Importation du fichier CSS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[mode,setMode]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleConnect=()=>{if(mode==="distant"){navigate("/distant");}else if(mode==="local"){navigate("/formulaire",{state:{mode:"local"}});}else{alert("Veuillez choisir un mode avant de continuer.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"home-title",children:"Welcome!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"home-subtitle",children:"You want to create your VM:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"radio-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"radio-label",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:"local",checked:mode==="local",onChange:()=>setMode("local"),className:"radio-input"}),"Local mode"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"radio-label",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",value:"distant",checked:mode==="distant",onChange:()=>setMode("distant"),className:"radio-input"}),"Distant mode"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"connect-button",onClick:handleConnect,children:"Connect"})]});};export default Home;
